name: a Stylish editor toy: show the Update URL
description: The Update URL is where Stylish expects to find the CSS stylesheet for the style. If you installed the style from Userstyles, the update URL will point to the style's page on Userstyles, and by editing it you can prevent updates from overwriting the style.
additional_info: The URL of the style page is everything that comes before ".css?". Copy+paste, avoid the Add-ons Manager. For example (blue = style page URL, bold = style id): https://userstyles.org/styles/121574/a-stylish-editor-toy-show-the-update-url.css? If you change the update URL in any way, Stylish will still find updates for the style and offer to install them, but update will silently fail for the style, leaving your local copy unchanged. For example, by appending an asterisk ("*") to the style id: https://userstyles.org/styles/121574*/a-stylish-editor-toy-show-the-update-url.css?
